backups.name: Fantasy Garment for UMA | 3D Clothing | Unity Asset Store

embeds.title: Fantasy Garment for UMA | 3D Clothing | Unity Asset Store
embeds.description:
**The package contains a toolbox to create UMA wardrobes for a medieval fantasy environment. Each element exists for male and female characters:**
- 54x2 slots
- 189x2 overlays using 512x512 textures (diffuse, normal, metallic)
- 87x2 prepared recipes

**The garment is organized into the following basic groups:**
- Body (inc. dress, robe, shirt, body armour, hauberk)
. Headwear (incl. helmet, hat)
- Footwear (incl. shoes, boots)
- Legwear (incl. trousers, leg armor)
- Handwear (incl. gloves and long gloves)

**The package contains additionally:**
- All textures as 2048x2048 png files
- A MeshHide and SlotHide organization tool
- Documentation which slots and overlays can be combined.
- Documentation about the tools and how to replace the textures
